term.name: Documentaries

seo.title: Documentaries
seo.description: Our streaming video documentaries collection has been painstakingly compiled to offer both breadth and depth. Nature, history, travel, or current events - we have it all!

term.body: Explore the world in which we live – right from your computer. Gaia’s extensive documentary collection brings you eye-opening films from around the globe to inform, awaken and inspire you. You’ll enjoy learning about science, nature, literature, world religions and more with our curated library of enlightening documentaries.

teaser.value: Explore breakthroughs in the fields of energy medicine, quantum physics, DNA and genetics, and the biochemistry of emotions.  See how the old conventional healthcare models, which have relied on surgery and prescription drugs, are being challenged by a wave of dramatic, non-invasive mind-body and energy-based healing techniques.

Through interviews with seven controversial Bible scholars, the Caesar’s Messiah documentary shows that Christianity was invented by the Romans as a political tool to control the masses of the day, and it is still being used this way today.

titles.title: Caesar’s  Messiah: The Roman Conspiracy to Invent Jesus

teaser.value: From the director of The Secret comes this unparalleled and life-changing film about the astonishing power and intelligence of your heart.
There is one vibratory field that connects all things and it is the link between our inner and our outer worlds. Watch the documentary to find out more.
Featuring interviews with 12 experts in the field of energy and consciousness, The Path: Afterlife is intended to eliminate some of the fear associated with death and dying.

Imagine a world where the trapped emotions, fears, anxieties and unprocessed life experiences we hold in our bodies are the source of everything that ails us. E-Motion creates new paradigms in the way we approach our health.

New Zealand sacred sites researcher Gary Cook wanted to find out whether the fairy folk beings are physical or if they live in another dimension. He engaged a camera crew and went into the bush to find out.
Science of the Soul explores the cutting edge of consciousness-related science to determine whether we are about to experience a new step in human evolution – or the death of the human soul.

Discover the hidden secrets of a timeless mystery in this award-winning film about the greatest crop circle formations ever created. The creators of these paranormal formations still remain a mystery.

titles.title: Crop Circles: Crossovers from Another Dimension?

teaser.value: Alberto Villoldo, PhD., introduces and explains the luminous energy field that surrounds and informs our physical body like a blueprint of life. Join us as we travel to the Andes Mountains to learn the secret of the ancient Shamans, a secret that can lead all of us to health, happiness and beauty.

The Living Matrix uncovers new ideas about the intricate web of factors that determine our health. The film features a group of dedicated scientists, psychologists, bioenergetic researchers and holistic practitioners who are finding healing potential in new places.

This is the story of James Gilliland. From UFOs and ETs, to orbs and near death encounters, James has led an incredible life. His story not only tells the journey of one man through an incredible life, it also tells the story of a mankind to come.
The Great Lesson is a provocative new film about the unlimited boundaries of mind and body.
Medication is at an all time high, and fewer people are actually getting “better”.  How can we synthesize the ancient science of Ayurveda with our current treatments today?

Within each of us, there are special gifts simply awaiting discovery. The sense of joy, power, fulfillment, freedom and unconditional love that we experience in our lives is directly related to these gifts.

Yoga was brought to the west from India by male teachers. Now a generation of women are leading the way and they’re radically changing people’s lives. Yogawoman uncovers a global phenomenon that has changed the face of yoga forever.

What happens after we pass from this world? Is there a life after this one? Or do we just disappear forever? These are the questions asked in this powerful and poignant feature documentary. We hear from several experts and luminaries who share their understanding of the afterlife.
Thomas Keating: A Rising Tide of Silence is a reflective portrait of Father Thomas Keating, one of today's most influential spiritual leaders.

titles.title: Thomas Keating: A Rising Tide of Silence

teaser.value: First released in theaters in 2004, What the BLEEP Do We Know!? went on to become one of the most successful documentaries of all time, stunning audiences with its revolutionary cinematic blend of dramatic film, documentary, animation and comedy, while serving up a mind-jarring blend of Quantum Physics, spirituality, neurology and evolutionary thought.

titles.title: What the BLEEP Do We Know!?

teaser.value: Successful Hollywood director Tom Shadyac speaks with intellectual and spiritual leaders about what's wrong with our world and how we can improve both it and the way we live in it.
Burning Man, the annual week-long experiment in community, art, and radical self-expression, has grown famous for inspiring ordinary people to shed their 9-to-5 existence and act on their dreams.

A spiritual teacher begins making a film about how others transform in sacred sites but ends up revealing her own heart-healing journey from buried secrets. Led by scientists, authors and indigenous elders, this film takes you to where the action is: the heart.

The official denial and the ridicule began in 1942 with the Battle of Los Angeles, where a UFO was fired upon by our military that could not bring it down. This film brings an end to over sixty years of official denial.

titles.title: UFO: The Greatest Story Ever Denied – Part 1

teaser.value: From the moment life first came into existence upon our planet, it was dependent upon the vitality of water. Over the years, our use and misuse of this precious resource has altered the vital information it carries in unexpected ways.

For the very first time, six of North America's most prominent channelers are featured in the same film. Viewers gain a rare glimpse and insight into the phenomenon, as well as the information being transmitted.
Choice Point is a groundbreaking film on how we both individually and collectively can be the change that we want to see in the world.

During an expedition to the Andes, 25 years ago, Alberto Villoldo discovered something that would change his life and our understanding of spiritual healing. He explains, in his own words, his discovery of traditional Incan healing methods and the nature of the luminous body.

We are not alone in the universe, nor are we alone here on Planet Earth. The Earth has been visited by advanced interstellar civilizations that can travel through other dimensions faster than the speed of light.
The Path: Beyond the Physical explores the topics about astral projection, multiple dimensions, various states of consciousness, remote viewing and the once-classified military mission Stargate.

One Track Heart: The Story of Krishna Das follows Jeffrey Kagel, a young musician, on his journey to India and back, his struggles with depression and drug abuse, and his eventual emergence as Krishna Das — the world-renowned spiritual teacher, chant master and Grammy-nominated recording artist.

Award-winning filmmaker Richard Martini explores startling new evidence of life after death via the "life between lives," where we reportedly return to find loved ones, soul mates and spiritual teachers.

titles.title: Flipside: My Journey into the Afterlife

teaser.value: Death is real, it comes without warning and it cannot be escaped. Part 1: A Way of Life reveals the history of The Tibetan Book of the Dead and examines its traditional use in northern India, as well as its acceptance in Western hospices.

titles.title: The Tibetan Book of the Dead – Part 1: The Way of Life

teaser.value: For many generations, researchers have been trying to unravel the nature of human thought. “I think, therefore I am” – but, what are thoughts?  Just some fleeting void?  Or a huge and as yet scarcely researched secret of life?

What if the resurrection perpetuated by the Church is a fraud? That it was actually a secret initiation, described by mystics and scholars as the pinnacle of one’s spiritual development, when a living person discovered the secrets of nature and the soul?

titles.title: Otherworld: Places of Initiation and Living Resurrection

teaser.value: Jim Marrs takes you into a secret world and exposes the truth about Ancient Aliens and their connection to modern rulers.

titles.title: Ancient Aliens and the New World Order

teaser.value: Finding Joe is an inspiring exploration of famed mythologist Joseph Campbell and his studies’ continuing impact on our culture.

Three leading figures in today’s Buddhist-Christian dialogue share their personal journeys. We learn how following the path of the Buddha has informed and deepened their understanding of who Jesus was and what he taught.
Marci Shimoff presents a path to lasting happiness with these seven steps to being happy from the inside out.
Learn how anyone can use the Moses Code, unlocking hidden potential within every individual and humanity itself.﻿
The fate of the world is in the hands of an ancient esoteric order. What can we do to reclaim the world? Watch the Esoteric Agenda video to find out more.
What happens when we die? Is there a loving creator? Does heaven exist? Are we all connected? What is the purpose of life? Six survivors of near-death experiences tell their compelling stories.

For a few years now, scientists have known about the existence of another brain within our bodies – billions of connected neurons, molecules (neurotransmitters) that transmit orders and induce independent reactions. This second brain is none other than our stomach.

video_lang.value: English, French, Chinese and German with English subtitles

teaser.value: Jay Weidner journeys from the shores of southern France through alchemical Europe, ancient Egypt and Peru, to decode the powerful and haunting message of the Great Cross of Hendaye. He reveals some of the deepest secrets of the ancient western tradition of alchemy.
Legends speak of giants that once walked the earth. In America alone there have been many accounts and skeletons exhumed. Where did the evidence go? Did the Smithsonian Institution cover it up?

Allow yourself to travel even further down the quantum rabbit hole in a quest for answers to age-old questions. Discover remarkable possibilities regarding what happens to our consciousness before and after death.

Mankind has saturated itself in an ocean of artificial frequencies and we are only now beginning to understand it's impact. Resonance investigates the actual mechanisms by which mobile phone technology can cause cancer.
Did we land on the Moon? The answer is without a doubt, yes! This film is about what was waiting for us when we got there and the lies put into motion in order to conceal what was found.

titles.title: UFO: The Greatest Story Ever Denied – Part 2: Moon Rising

teaser.value: Free the Mind is the fantastic tale of how one man’s vision provides a turning point in the lives of three people. Professor Richard Davidson is one of the world’s leading researchers of the human brain. He sets out to discover if, and how, it is possible to physically change the brain using only the power of thought.

The Lost Secret of Immortality explores the evolution of consciousness and the ultimate potential of humanity. For thousands of years, the spiritual quest of the human race has been to discover the true self – the eternal light of the kundalini.
A deeply enriching spiritual journey of a woman who finds herself in a deep crisis and sets off to find the meaning of life.

The Mindfulness Movie is a fun and educational journey showcasing the worldwide brain research proving the benefits of mindfulness and the public’s increasing awareness and acceptance of the practice.
The Healing Effect movie is a new documentary about the healing power of food.

We may be quick to blame secret organizations, greedy corporations and corrupt politicians for the state of the environment and economy. The harsh truth is that we are evolving and taking the world with us. There is hope, if we learn what the ancients have left behind – for that can save everything.

How the US government created a myth that took over the world.  What if, instead of covering up the UFO stories, elements in the US military had actively encouraged them as perfect cover for their Cold War counterintelligence operations?

There is no telling what is really going on deep in space. But one thing is absolutely for certain, there is not one film or photo in this movie that was taken from earth. You will see real life UFOs captured in the far regions of space by NASA and foreign space agencies.

titles.title: UFO: The Greatest Story Ever Denied – Part 3: UFOs from Outer Space

teaser.value: Overweight, sick and depressed, 54-year-old Frank Ferrante lives a life of despair and disappointment.  One day he meets the young manager of a vegan café specializing in raw foods, who offers to coach Frank back to health.

Hidden deep in the south of France, practically untouched by the modern age is a place known by many as “the Zone.” In this space the supernatural is an everyday reality of life. Magic is everywhere. It is reason. It is currency. It is unquestionable fact.

This award-winning documentary explores the mystery of ayahuasca shamanism, offering insights into the nature of spirituality, mystical experience and self-healing discovered through an expanded state of consciousness.

Does the sun have the power to transform humankind? Here’s a compelling case, with a wealth of scientific evidence showing a remarkable correlation between increases in solar activity and advances in our creative, mental and spiritual abilities.

Song of the New Earth features the transformative life journey of renowned sound healer, psychotherapist and modern day mystic Tom Kenyon, who went from being a young aspiring Nashville musician to an internationally revered sound alchemist.

Leaked government material, declared genuine by experts, documents that the United States has been recovering crashed UFOs since 1941, and has been successful in keeping this information from the public.

titles.title: The Secret: Evidence that We Are Not Alone in the Universe

teaser.value: Filmmaker Simon Sharman goes in search of answers to the biggest UFO mystery of the 20th century, as he tracks down the last living witnesses to the Roswell incident of 1947.

In 1965 Helen Schucman and William Thetford were drawn together by the compulsion of Helen’s inner voice that said, “This is a Course in Miracles, please take notes”. Spoken narration and dramatizations of allegories bring the teachings to life in this documentary.

Science has improved living conditions and saved the lives of millions, yet it still cannot explain the origin and function of consciousness. Peter Russell explores the nature of human consciousness and how spiritual traditions awaken and empower said consciousness.

Filmmaker and researcher Jay Weidner reveals the secret knowledge embedded in the work of the greatest filmmaker of all time: Stanley Kubrick. This famed movie director placed symbols and hidden anecdotes into his films that tell a far different story than the films appeared to be saying.

Filmmaker and researcher Jay Weidner provides a provocative examination of Stanley Kubrick’s masterpiece, 2001: A Space Odyssey. He reveals that the film is actually a work of alchemy initiating the viewer into a higher consciousness and opening the mind and heart to new vistas for the entire human race.

When documentarian Alan Zweig discovered Ray Robertson's non-fiction book – Why Not? Fifteen Reasons To Live – he felt a strong compulsion to make a film on the subject. Lucky for all of us, he did just that.

We live in the midst of other dimensions that our eyes alone cannot perceive. New technological advances are allowing us to confirm what many have believed: that there is more to our world than meets the eye.
Renowned theologian Robert Beckford traces the astonishing similarities of the stories surrounding the lives of Jesus and other religious figures, including Horus, Mithras, Krishna and Buddha.

titles.title: The Hidden Story Of Jesus – Part 1

teaser.value: Many religions have created rituals and dogmas that separate one from the other and cling to the belief that only they have the "one truth." But are any of them actually right? Can the true essence of God ever truly be understood or explained?
The Great Year examines not only how ancient cultures studied and documented astronomy, but also how these ancient records demonstrate cultural cycles of consciousness found throughout time.
Angel Stories presents actual interviews with people who tell of their amazing, true encounters with these mysterious heavenly hosts.

The practice of making regular skin contact with the Earth, like taking barefoot walks on the beach or on the grass – or better yet swimming in natural bodies of water – has been clinically shown to help heal chronic inflammatory diseases in 95% of all cases.
“Billy” Eduard Albert Meier's meetings with extraterrestrials lead to his becoming the messenger for an advanced race of ET beings known as the Plejaran.

titles.title: The Silent Revolution of Truth: UFOs and Prophecies from Outer Space

teaser.value: Learn how to transform your eating habits for good.
Cutting edge perspectives on humankind's potential to create a positive future for the Earth.

Now presenting fascinating new theories and discoveries about the missing link of human evolution and the soul of man, as we explore the ancient mystery of the Carpathian Sphinx and evidence of an intervening leap in human evolution.

titles.title: The Mystery of the Carpathian Sphinx

teaser.value: The Indigo Children have arrived! Is it possible that children today are being born with amazing spiritual, artistic and intuitive abilities, the likes of which have never been seen before?

A feature documentary about the resurgence of psychedelics as medicine.  Psychedelics can be potent tools for getting to know who we are, who we can be, and for healing the trauma of a society that is addicted to greed and consumerism.

titles.title: Neurons to Nirvana: Understanding Psychedelic Medicines

teaser.value: For the first time ever, the subtle forces that make the world’s greatest temples such unique power places have been decoded. And they can be used by anyone, anywhere – including your own home.

In a world dominated by violence, how can we create peace in our lives? This award-winning film goes on an extraordinary journey with the Dalai Lama, demonstrating how any one of us can create change and transform the world in which we live.
Unknown entities piloting UFOs have engaged in a long-term surveillance of America's nuclear weapons, according to declassified documents and military witness testimony.

titles.title: UFOs and Nukes: The Secret Link Revealed

teaser.value: Tuning In Two, the much anticipated sequel to Tuning In, offers fresh and profound information from seven new channelers and their non-physical friends.
John of God: Miraculous healer? Great sage? Or just a man, with a mission from God?

titles.title: John of God: Just a Man?

teaser.value: A global quest for a solution to the current obesity epidemic. The film explores modern dietary science, previous historical findings, ancestral native diets and the emerging field of human dietary evolution.

How did a Persian mystic poet of the 13th century become the bestselling poet in America? Rumi: Poet of the Heart explores how Jelaluddin Rumi was discovered in the West and features two of the individuals responsible – Coleman Barks and Robert Bly.
For almost 20 years, a group of extraterrestrials contacted hundreds of people of high social and cultural importance. The witnesses of this incredible alien contact are finally willing to speak.

titles.title: UFO Secret: The Friendship Case – The Extraordinary Story of Mass Alien Contact

teaser.value: Harvard psychiatrist John Mack, MD and filmmaker Laurel Chiten explore the mystery of alien abductions and extraterrestrial contact. You will be amazed by what they discover.

titles.title: Touched: The Extreme Experience Research of Dr. John Mack

teaser.value: The Spirit Molecule unravels the connections between cutting-edge neuroscience, quantum mechanics and human spirituality.
Marijuana as a cancer fighting drug? Science says yes, federal law says no. A woman’s desperate search for a cure for her brain cancer leads her to break the law to try to prolong her life.

The Four Horsemen is an independent feature documentary that lifts the lid on how the world really works. It invites us to think about ushering a new economic paradigm into the world that would dramatically improve the quality of lives across all countries.
An interview with Drunvalo Melchizedek that brings his inner thoughts on spiritualism and other subjects to the light.
A feature-length documentary that focuses on a young man’s journey into the little known world of sungazing – an ancient practice of looking directly at the sun for long periods of time.
Can you live happily without money? In this fascinating and thought-provoking documentary, we meet a woman who gave up all money 14 years ago, and supports herself by exchanging favors.

Is death the key to balancing and maintaining life?  What is consciousness – does it die with our body, or is it something larger and ongoing? Cultural anthropologist Marilyn Schlitz explores the mysteries of life and death.

Awaken to the reality that unites us all. With One Voice features mystics from many great traditions around the world who illuminate the unity of humanity through the mystical traditions that binds all faiths together.

Robert Beckford continues his search to understand the life and meaning of Jesus by looking back from outside Christianity, to see how Judaism and Islam view Jesus, and also by examining the way Mahatma Gandhi found inspiration in Jesus’ teachings.

titles.title: The Hidden Story of Jesus – Part 2

teaser.value: Is there any real proof of life after death? The surprising answer is Yes! A fear of dying and a massive dose of skepticism led Sandra Champlain on a fifteen-year journey of discovery for proof of life after death.
Join us on a journey of discovery to find the spirit gateways to the fairy realm, a magical and mystical realm that lives in nature.

Director Peter Joseph presents a feature length documentary that presents a case for us to move out of the economic and political systems that are failing the vast majority of people, world-wide. This is a call to build a new and sustainable society based on resources not money.
